post.body: We are going out to dinner then for a couples-only (I think) poker tourney! With the usual group but only some of us...
So I suspect if I'm lucky it will be lowered a bit, or a few points dropped, but I suspect it could stay as it which SUCKS.
HAH! I'm sure *that* would go well ;-) Hoping it dropped as 1st major tix, but got *4* speeding tix since moving to DEN :-(
I love the Far Side daily calendars, even though there are no new ones. I never get tired of it!
haha! I dunno!
I know what you mean. Last year was fun staying in but I am SO excited to be going out tomorrow night...
work on her! Twitter is the new black!
just finished watching Elf w/the girl and is taking care of some personal biz before hopping in the shower! Need to take Wk 52 before we go!
up at the usual 9am. Gonna pay some bills, watch Elf w/the kiddos (we got it right before xmas but it was broken!), then get ready for NYE!
ate too much Williams-Sonoma Peppermint Bark and is beyond feeling guilty - now just feeling like I am going to get sick. Pepto chuggin'!
is relieved court went well. 6 point offense w/$400 fine reduced to 2 point infraction w/$100 fine. I'll take it! Bad timing for $, though.
is totally surprised about Mike Shanahan!
is trying to decide what to wear to court tonight. I have lots of nice clothes, but they are not necessarily conservative...
just had a late lunch w/D & kiddos, and now is taking a shower. We have a free dinner we won @ 4, then I have errands then TRAFFIC COURT :-(
is trying to plan out the day. Lotsa little things between now and tomorrow night - things to do, errands, etc. Think I'll start w/manicure!
slept in til what seems to be the usual wakeup-without-alarm-no-matter-what-time-to-bed time of 9am. Now, time for breakfast with Dave!
home from dinner + gettin' ready for some RB2 once kiddos asleep (movie room right across the hall - we won't sing, tho!). Tired already...
is downtown for dinner w/her favorite guy + favorite kids <3
Having a snack break w/the kiddos at Dave+Busters...just don't tell @daverexwood - he is home working!
would just like to say one more time how much I LOVE my new VEGAN purse! I drooled over it on here and my mom got it for me! Melie Bianco!
